data.text: The Field did not destroy Valdris. It is rewriting it.
data.author: Final Chronicle

data.text: Last week, your mother called you by a different name. Not as a mistake - like she had never known any other.
data.author: The Wound Beneath

data.text: Some return - but without their meaning. They stagger out empty-eyed, wordless.
data.author: A Keeper's Warning

data.text: Eight seals. Eight Wardens. One truth buried beneath.
data.author: The Descent Codex

data.text: The dungeon recorded you. In another descent, you may be seen again.
data.author: Echo Fragment

data.text: We are all becoming what the Field remembers us to be.
data.author: Last Words of the Archivist

data.text: Victory does not end the threat. It delays it.
data.author: The Last King's Testament

data.text: The artifacts are not treasures. They are interfaces.
data.author: Forbidden Tome
